name: Andrew's Projects
body:
# Projects
## [Genealogy](https://github.com/arr28/Genealogy)
Moving beyond GEDCOM to use the GEDTECH Genealogical Data Model as the foundation for evidence-based genealogy research.

## [Music transcription](https://github.com/arr28/MusicTranscription)
Producing musical score from audio recordings.

## [Diplomacy AI](http://www.daide.org.uk)
* Writing the framework in which computer players can play Diplomacy.
* Writing Diplomacy AIs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
